title: Services
text:
10mapz provides spatial data visualization services for research, government, and industry. We transform complex datasets into clear, compelling maps and interactive visualizations.
Our services include:

Beautiful maps: We create high-quality, accessible maps tailored to your needs. Whether for presentations, publications, or reports, our maps are designed to communicate your spatial data effectively and with visual appeal. We focus on cartographic principles and best practices to ensure accuracy, clarity, and engagement.
Interactive maps & dashboards: Explore your data dynamically with our interactive maps and dashboards. We develop custom solutions that allow you to zoom, pan, filter, and analyze your data in real-time. Our interactive visualizations help you uncover hidden patterns, gain new insights, and share your findings with others in an engaging way.
Expert analysis: We offer expert support in spatial data analysis and visualization. Our team can help you with data cleaning, processing, analysis, and interpretation. We guide you through the process of turning raw data into meaningful insights and compelling visual stories.

Ready to visualize your data? Let’s get started!
Contact us

title: Courses
text:
10mapz offers a range of courses designed to empower you with the knowledge and practical skills needed to explore, analyze, and visualize spatial data effectively. We provide both introductory and intermediate/advanced courses in two categories:

Data Visualization Foundations
These courses focus on broader concepts and techniques in data visualization and spatial analysis:

Introduction to Data Visualization: Learn the fundamental principles of effective data visualization, regardless of the tools used. (On demand)
Spatial Data Visualization: Explore the specific techniques and considerations for visualizing spatial data, including cartographic principles and map design. (On demand)
Spatial Data Science: Dive deeper into the world of spatial data science, covering topics like spatial analysis, geostatistics, and spatial modeling. (On demand)



Programming with R
These courses focus on using the R programming language for data analysis and visualization:

Introduction to R: Learn the fundamentals of R programming, including data structures, functions, and basic syntax. (On demand)
Data Visualization in R: Master the art of creating compelling visualizations in R, using packages like ggplot2. (On demand)
Spatial Data Analysis in R: Explore and analyze spatial data using R, with a focus on techniques for mapping and spatial statistics. Scheduled 6-9 May 2025 at PRstats

Our courses are designed to provide practical, hands-on experience to help you master data analysis and visualization tools and techniques.
Contact us to learn more about our courses or to discuss your training needs.

title: About
text:
Martijn Tennekes is a part-time freelancer, with 20 years of experience in teaching, academic research, and consulting. He is affiliated with Statistics Netherlands where he contributed to several international research projects, was course leader for several courses organized by the European Commission (Eurostat). Martijn has a strong background in academics, in particular game theory, data visualization, spatial data, and statistical programming. He received his Ph. D in 2010 at Maastricht University and also collaborated extensively with other universities, including Eindhoven University, the University of Münster, and the University of Oxford. Martijn is the main author of several popular R packages, including tmap and cols4all.



Martijn Tennekes


In his free time, Martijn enjoys playing guitar, doing outdoor sports, and spending time with his family.

title: Workshops
text:
Our workshops offer focused, hands-on training in key topics related to spatial data visualization and analysis. Designed for professionals, students, and enthusiasts, these short and intensive sessions help you quickly gain new skills.

Workshop Format
Workshops can be delivered on-site at your institution or remotely via Zoom or your preferred platform. Each session is designed to be highly interactive and practical, equipping you with skills you can apply immediately. Workshops include an engaging introduction, hands-on exercises, and collaborative activities to ensure an immersive learning experience.
Currently, no workshops are pre-scheduled, but I am available to organize sessions based on interest. You can choose from the suggested topics below or reach out to discuss a custom workshop tailored to your needs.


Potential Workshop Topics

Getting Started with R – Learn the basics of R for data analysis and visualization.
Getting Started with tmap – Create beautiful and effective maps using the tmap package.
It’s All About Colors – Master color palette selection for clear and compelling visualizations.
Spatial Data Exploration – Uncover patterns and insights in your spatial datasets.

Interested in organizing a workshop? Contact me to discuss your needs and explore custom options!
